main event: A point of light was observed during a distant maneuver in Covington, Kentucky on June 27, 1954.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 1 to 2 minutes,The object exhibited non-erratic maneuvering after initially appearing as a point of light,The report belongs to Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings,The sighting took place at 2203 hours,The report indicates no photographs were taken.
sighted object: a point of light in the sky
witness description: no witnesses described in the report
